meaningMnemonic: <radical>Criminal</radical> <radical>writing</radical> is always <kanji>patterned</kanji>. That is to say, there is a pattern to it, lots of ARGS and GONNA STAB YAs, but it's also patterned beautifully, with a collage of cut out letters.
readingMnemonic: As you look closer at the <kanji>patterned</kanji> writing you realize that it forms the shape of an <reading>eagle</reading> (い). The most American bird of them all! Maybe this guy isn't a criminal after all!
